name: Bright and airy room
description: We have a quiet and sunny room with a good view in our 3 bedroom flat. In a welcoming atmosphere, our clean and respectful flatshare is located in a leafy neighbourhood with all facilities: shops, library, cafes and bars, a swimming pools, gyms, and fantastic parks. Well connected by metro and bus with the centre: 15 minutes. For walks, we are also a 20 min stroll away from the riverside.
neighborhood_overview: We live in a leafy neighbourhood with plenty of green areas and recreational opportunities such as the library, gyms, swimming pools (covered and summer ones), and the tennis courts. Parking is free outside and it is relatively easy to park near the flat.
host_about:
EN-ES-FR
EN
Hi everybody: I'm Abdel. I'm spanish originaly from Casablanca (Morocco). I've been living for many years in Andlusian area and now in Madrid that I like very much, since 11 years. My job is related with languages and communication. I'm a quiet person. I don't smoke, and I do some sport. I like nature, painting and photography.
Please, do ask me any thing you consider useful for you. 
Kind regards.
 -----
ES
Hola chicos y chicas: soy Abdel. Soy español original de Casablanca, Marruecos. He vivido muchos años en Andalucía y ahora llevo casi 11 años en Madrid, que me encanta. Mi trabajo está relacionado con las lenguas y la comunicación. Soy una persona tranquila y algo reflexiva. No fumo, hago algo de deportes, y me gusta además de la naturaleza, la puntura y la fotografía.
En caso de necesidad, no duden en plantearme cualquier pregunta que consideran oportuna. 
Un cordial saludo.

FR
Bonjour, tout le monde,
Je suis Abdel, espagnol d'origine marocaine (de Casablanca). J'ai vecu pendant plusieurs annees en Andalousie, mais maintenant je suis installe à Madrid depuis 11 ans. Je suis une personne cool et un peu pensatif. Je ne fume pas et je pratique un peu de sport. D'autre part, je suis un amoureux de la nature, la peinture et la photographie. S'il vous plait, n'hesitez pas de me poser des questions, si vous en avez besoin ...
Cordialement,

name: Gran Via Studio Madrid
description: Studio located 50 meters from Gran Via, next to the Plaza de Callao. In the best shopping and cinemas and theaters. Comfortable apartment for 3 people. 1 bed and  the sofa bed in the lounge. Fully furnished.
neighborhood_overview: The area is next to the Gran Via, so people living in the area is mostly tourists. Being so well located, it is very interesting for short stays.

name: Lovely 110m2 home - Best location!
description: SPACIOUS, 2 BEDROOM HOLIDAY HOME: 2 BATHROOMS,IDEAL FOR BOTH SHORT & LONG TERM STAY. REFURBISHED IN 2018PLEASE SEND ME A MESSAGE BEFORE BOOKING!
neighborhood_overview: It can be said without hesitation that this flat enjoys the best location on offer for a holiday in Madrid. Practically a stone's throw away from Madrid's 3 most important art galleries (Prado, Thyssen and Reina Sofia), it straddles the historic Barrio de las Letras and the Huertas Neighbourhoods with their cultural offer and bustling nightlife, while being a 5 minute walk away from Madrid’s famous Retiro Park and 10 minutes from walk from the Puerta del Sol. The street itself is beautiful, lined with bars, restaurants and taverns but the flat is very quiet at night. All of central Madrid (Sol, Gran Via, Lavapies, Plaza Mayor) is within walking distance from the flat..
host_about:
Hi!

I’m a young professional often away for work and am renting out my own home in central Madrid, since I barely use it now. 

It’s a place I love and is in my opinion by far the best located place in the entire city, not just on this site. 

I'll be looking forward to meeting you I will make your stay as pleasant and comfortable as possible. 

I speak fluent English, Spanish and French so please do get in touch if you are interested.

name: Private Room in a Sunny and Luxuriously Appointed Apartment
description: Set a traditional dining table and enjoy a delicious homemade breakfast. Choose a book from a glass cabinet afterwards, and read on an inviting couch or in bed. Catch up on email on a computer by a picture window with views of a quiet neighborhood.In a quiet area of the city of Madrid (Arturo Soria neighborhood), just 15 minutes from IFEMA and 20 minutes from the airport by metro, I rent a private room with bathroom in a 90 m2 (1000 ft) flat.  It looks onto a private garden and swimming pool which ou can enjoy  during your stay in Madrid. WiFi and free national landline calls are included.  If you are planning to stay for a long period of time (more than a week) washing clothes (but not ironing!) and room/bathroom cleaning are included as well.  Metro entrance is just 1 minute walk from the building (line 4-ESPERANZA stop) and 3 minutes walk you can find buses number 120 and 122. You can get to the historic center less than half an hour.
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is in the peaceful Arturo Soria neighborhood. Entrance to the Metro is a 1-minute walk. Reach the historic center of Madrid in less than half an hour.
host_about:
Soy una persona tranquila, amante de la calma y el orden. Me gusta cocinar, la jardinería y disfrutar de la vida junto a mi familia y amigos.

He vivido en Estados Unidos y el Reino Unido por lo que me siento muy a fin con la cultura anglosajona. Me gusta conocer gente de todo el mundo porque es la manera más directa y bonita de aprender. Siempre que puedo me escapo a algún rincón en el extranjero para conocer nuevos lugares y culturas.

Si todos cumplimos unas mínimas normas de convivencia esta resulta genial. Me encantará ayudarte a orientarte sobre que lugares y rincones debes visitar en Madrid, sobre todo esos que los que vivimos en la ciudad visitamos y que normalmente los turistas no conocen :-)
amenities: Shared outdoor pool - available seasonally, open specific hours

name: MAGIC ARTISTIC HOUSE IN THE CENTER OF MADRID
description: INCREDIBLE HOME OF AN ARTIST SURROUNDED BY PAINTINGS AND ARTWORK. AMPLE AND BRIGHT APARTMENT OF 120 M2 WITH A SPACIOUS, OPEN KITCHEN. PERFECT TO COOK AT HOME AND ENJOY DINNER. FEEL HOME AT THIS WELL AND PLEASANT FLAT WITH A SPECIAL DECORATED LIVING ROOM. AVAILABLE DURING THE WHOLE GAYPRIDE  ENJOY MADRID'S TRENDIEST DISTRICT WITHIN A COZY ATMOSPHERE IN THE CENTER OF MADRID BETWEEN GRAN VIA AND CHUECA. FULL OF ART MUSEUMS, PRADO MUSEUM, rEINA SOFIA AND THYSSEN ART MUSEUM, CLOSE TO MY APARTMENT

I am an artist... and I will be glad to have you at my Home Art Museum... in a sunny, pleasant, cozy and exotic place, in the main center of Madrid (Chueca District)

Soy artista... y estare encantado de tenerte en mi Casa Museo de Arte... Un lugar soleado, agradable, acogedor, exótico, y en pleno centro de Madrid (Barrio de Chueca)

name: *** Malasaña B&B exterior***
description: Centric flat of 150m with private room, exterior with balcony, 2 beds: one double bed and other single,WIFI.Maximum dicrection and calm, near GRAN VIA:SOL,excelent relation quality-price,(URL HIDDEN) the center.Perfect for 2 o 3 persons !You can check my other rooms:https://www.airbnb.es/rooms/4327320https://www.airbnb.es/rooms/93100
neighborhood_overview: The nickname -Malasaña- neighborhood will come following the street dedicated in 1879 to the family and since 1961 Malasaña young seamstress Manuela Malasaña, killed by Napoleon's troops during the days of repression subsequent to the lifting of May 2, 1808 on charges of "bear arms" to bring a sewing scissors when she was arrested. His body was buried in the Hospital of the Good Bliss on the street Silva.At the heart of the neighborhood is Plaza Dos de Mayo, which was the former site of Artillery Monteleón, where they were quartered against "francesada" the little military force that took up arms against the Napoleonic army, under the command two captains Pedro Velarde and Luis Daoiz. In the remodeled square arch of old barracks it remains. Other typical neighborhood squares are, for example, San Ildefonso and Santa Maria Soledad Torres Acosta.Like many other central areas of Madrid Maravillas district it has enough alternative atmosphere and nightlife. name: Adorable Apartment Malasaña-Gran Via
description: Beautiful apartment with spacious living room with 2 balconies only 200 meters from Gran Via Ave, and only 3 minutes walking to Chueca and Malasaña areas, the most demanding zones of central Madrid
neighborhood_overview: Just a few meters away from Gran Via Metro Station and about 5 minutes walking from the city's "0 kilometer" in the Puerta del Sol. Absolute centre of the capital, the most historic but also modern, the most tourist but at the same time the most crowded by locals.A few minutes walk form this apartment is enough to reach the most visited places in the city. Emblematic points such as the Plaza Mayor, Palacio Real and Gran Vía –Madrid's Broadway Street, just one block away-.Worldwide known museums such as Reina Sofía, Prado or Thyssen Bornemisza, and the main park : El Retiro . Everything within walking distance! And of course this is an area where you'll find the best and most typical restaurants, bars and shops.The perfect place if you're willing to get to know Madrid's essence.
host_about:
Hola, 
Me encanta viajar y conocer gente de otras culturas y costumbres. Por eso disfruto alojando a personas de otros paises y lugares que me permiten ampliar mi visión del mundo.

name: Heart of Malasaña Cozy, Quiet & Sunny Apartment
description: Cozy Apartment in great location in the center of Madrid at a great price!You will be able to visit all Madrid on foot!
neighborhood_overview: Located in the heart of Malasaña,  2 minutes from the Gran Via Avenue and near Chueca, the gay quarter of Madrid, it is also where you will find a vibrant night life, and exciting shopping streets.This lively cultural hub of Madrid is simply teeming with every kind of restaurant, bar, club and shop you would want or need.The Apartments Malasaña 1 and 2 (which are together in the same building and floor) are perfect for anyone who wants to know and enjoy Madrid. Located in a renovated historic building next to the Gran Via and Puerta del Sol and near Chueca and Malasaña, are within walking distance of everything, so you can visit Madrid on foot. This apartment located in the heart of Madrid has all the amenities to make your stay as comfortable and you feel at home.

description: The apartment is a quiet, secluded idyll in the heart of Madrid. It was renovated and redecorated in 2014. With 3 bedrooms distributed over 2 floors, it can host up to 9 people (1 double bed and 1 single bed per bedroom). You will enjoy the intimacy and quiet  of the rooftop terrace.

name: ARCO TOLEDO - CUCHILLEROS ST. CASA BALCONIES
description: Please before make the reservation, ENTER correctly the total NUMBER of GUEST, including you, that will be staying at the apartment and READ the HOUSE RULES.
neighborhood_overview: NEIGHBOURHOOD & LOCATION:Here in the heart of Madrid’s city centre you are surrounded by a taste of grocery stores,  tapas bars, like the great famous Mercado de San Miguel and lots of conveniences.This is the "Los Austrias Neighbourhood" Sol district, bordering with La Latina Neighbourhood with the Cava Baja Street or  Las Letras neighbourhood with Huertas Street and Plaza de Santa Ana.You are under less 1 minute to the Plaza Mayor and 5 minutes walk you arrive at Palacio Real, Opera or to the Km 0 at Puerta del Sol; the centre of Madrid and, in fact, the centre of Spain.The apartment is also very close to the Prado, Thyssen and Reina Sofia museums, and the Botanic Gardens, Retiro Park, Gran Via, Cibeles Square and the Almudena Cathedral, as well as many theatres, cinemas, restaurants, tapas bars and only 5 minutes to El Rastro, the the very famous market situed in the streets during sundays mornings. Nearby Metro station: So
host_about:
I live in Madrid but I'm from the Basque Country in the north of Spain. The city where I come from is Vitoria-Gasteiz and has been recognized as the European Green Capital. 
I lived in Los Angeles In 1997, then I moved to New York, Barcelona, and finally I ended up in Madrid, a beautifull city shinned almost everyday under a great blue sky!
I'm an actress and I also manage these very nice apartments from my friends actors and artists too.
I also love traveling around the world and meeting new people!!

name: Cozy apartment in the coolest  neighbourhood
description: Cozy  and wide apartment of 75 m2 in the coolest neighbourhood in the world 2018 (Time Out Guide Ranking). "The coolest city in the world in 2018, Madrid's Embajadores is complete with great tlife, fabulous food, culture, and street art, according to Time Out."
neighborhood_overview: La Latina / Embajadores From: https://www.timeout.com/coolest-neighbourhoods-in-the-world Embajadoresneighbourhoods to visit in 2018The coolest neighbourhood in the world 2018 is Embajadores, Madrid Madrid might be the world’s most exciting capital right now, and Embajadores is its most colourful neighbourhood. This is a place where people from near and far live side by side, cooking up a bustling cultural life. To the north, Plaza Tirso de Molina is the territory of florists by day, and at night fills with young revellers queuing to get into Medias Puri, the city’s club of the moment. To the south are Tabacalera and La Casa Encendida, two huge cultural centres standing like transatlantic vessels run ashore in the middle of the city. You can dine on Indian specialities served atop a flowery oilcloth, or get a divine Moroccan lamb tagine for an absurdly low price. Nightlife and street life, street art and high culture, food and people from across the world:

name: Apartamento centrico, tranquilo y luminoso.
description: Quiet, well-equipped, cozy, comfortable and very bright apartment, in a central neighborhood with all amenities. Simple, nice and functional. Served directly by its owners, who try to provide you with good care and cleanliness.Quiet, well equipped, cozy, comfortable and very bright apartment, in a central neighborhood with all services. Simple, pleasant and functional. Attended directly by its owners, who try to provide you with good care and cleanliness.
host_about:
Soy una persona abierta y comunicativa. Me gusta la tranquilidad, respetar a los demás y ser respetada. Me gusta la música, la lectura y andar. Me gustan mucho los animales: perros, caballos, delfines,...-pero solo puedo tener en casa dos perritos yorkies-, Conozco muy bien el centro de madrid, y los lugares típicos para visitar, y te los puedo dar a conocer. Tengo pendiente viajar a China y Bulgaria, y dentro de unos meses voy a viajar a New York a ver a mi hijo 
.I am an open and communicative person. I like the calm, respect others and be respected. I like music, reading and walking. I like animals: dogs, horses, dolphins,...- but I only have two dogs at home yorkshire-, know very well the Centre of madrid, and typical places to visit, and I can teach how to meet them. I have yet to travel to China and Bulgaria, and in a few months I will travel to New York to see my son.

name: Cool Apart. (10min Center + WIFI)
description: Cool and confortable 1 bedroom apartment for 2-3  in central Madrid neighborhood. Quiet. 3rd floor with elevator. Very close Tapa's bar area, museums and Rastro Open Market.
neighborhood_overview: Madrid has much to offer you, places of great architectural and artistic interest, many palaces that once belonged or still belong to great families and kings, monasteries, and churches. museums like the Museo del Prado.The best way to stay during your visit to Madrid.It is located very close to the Central Train Station (3 metro stops) to visit Toledo and Segovia and conecting with Sevilla, Málaga and Barcelona.5-15 min. walking to Puerta del Sol, Plaza Mayor, Museums Triangle (Museo del Prado, Thyssen-Bornemisza and the Reina Sofia Art Center) and very close of tapas's Bars and local food restaurants.
host_about:
Hola. Soy Felipe. Una de mis aficiones favoritas es viajar y explorar lugares y ciudades del mundo todo lo que pueda en mi tiempo libre. Me gusta alojarme en apartamentos en zonas menos turísticas pero interesantes. Así realmente creo que encontramos la esencia de ca da lugar.

Hello. I'm felipe. In muy free time I like travelling around the world and explore every place and city I prefer stay at apartments in no turist neiborghood to feel the real atmosfere. 
I love a good dinner with my couple and enjoy a drinks with my friends.  I am a responsible, clean, careful and organized person.

name: Great Studio! Best Reviews!
description: Spacious and bright open-plan loft in the heart of Madrid's Malasaña district, located in the center of the city. The loft is equipped with air conditioning and WiFi. With 40 square meters of space and exposed wooden beams at a height of 5 meters, it features a kitchen area, living room, a very comfortable bed, and a small functional bathroom .This fantastic loft is fully equipped and perfect for couples looking for a comfortable  getaway in Madrid.
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the heart of Madrid's central district, known as Malasaña or Madrid's Soho. It is just one block away from the bustling San Ildefonso square, making it one of the trendiest and most exciting areas of this vibrant city. You'll find countless shops, bars, cafes, restaurants, galleries, theaters, and more, right at your doorstep.The building itself is a protected historical landmark from 1890 and is situated on a charming and character-filled street. Despite being centrally located, the space is bright and sunny, yet still quiet and peaceful."
host_about:
Mi name is Al. I am a professor at the university  in ESD Madrid and a profesional photographer for over 30 years. Through my work I have had the opportunity to travel a lot around the world, and get to know and enjoy different cultures and meet great people all over.
I have  converted my photography and portrait  studio to be used as a self catering loft, with everything you may need. You will be able to sense how this wonderful space is definitely special! 
My own apartment, where I life, is in the same building, so I am always available if there is anything you need or if you have any question. That is very practical because I can always take care of your luggage in case of an early check-in or late check-out.
I am in love with Madrid, and I would be delighted to welcome  & help you to discover Madrid. Its culture, museums, shopping, leisure, and gastronomy.
amenities: 50" HDTV with Amazon Prime Video, Netflix
Coffee maker: Keurig coffee machine, pour-over coffee

Localizado en la zona de mayor actividad económica de Madrid donde se ubican El Palacio Municipal de Congresos; La FERIA de Madrid IFEMA  acoge durante todo el año las ferias más importantes, FITUR, ARCO, PASARELA CIBELES, etc.; La zona verde metropolitana del PARQUE JUAN CARLOS I; Las oficinas de ENDESA; COCA COLA, CAMARA DE COMERCIO, IBERDROLA, SANITAS, CEPSA, Los Centros empresariales CRISTALIA, METROVACESA.  Si te gustan los deportes como el GOLF, el tenis, o el PADEL, a muy pocos metros esta el Olivar de la Hinojosa con dos campos de golf de  9 y 18 hoyos, zona de practicas,  pistas de padel. No te pierdas EL CORTE INGLES, uno de los grandes almacenes, mas visitados de España, a tan solo tres paradas Autobus (104). neighborhood_overview: If we were not from Madrid we would like someone recommends to us these sites, but it's all about taste ...TAPASLa Perejila (Calle Cava Baja, 25)Tapas from Southern Spain with traditional "copla" music and good ambientLa taberna del Almendro 13 (Calle Almendro 13)Authentic from Madrid, even if you find some tourists thereArbonaida (Calle Santiago, 11)Tapas from Andalucía by a great chef, fresh smoothies and good ambient. Taberna de La Dolores (Plaza de Jesús, 4)Best cañas in Madrid. Nothing more to sayHOMEMADE SPANISH FOODViuda de vacas (Calle Águila, 23)It is amazing to try real food from Madrid, the most "castizo" you will find. Try “Potaje de garbanzos con espinacas”, “callos a la madrileña”, “gallina en pepitoria”, “jamón asado” y “lomo alto” and boletus when season.Casa Perico (Calle Ballesta, 18) casapericomadrid.esAcross Gran Vía you will find this tradit

neighborhood_overview: You will be in a La Latina, a  traditional neighborhood of Madrid. A safe neighborhood to walk alone all hours of the day. Full of antique shops. El Rastro, the legendary open-air market is just out the building all Sundays and holidays , It is an experience you can't miss.The apartment is 4 minutes walking to La Latina (line 5) metro station and the parking.10 minutes walking to Plaza Mayor and "Los Austrias" and "Lavapies" neighborhoodsNear the apartment there are supermarket, pharmacy, all kinds of shops and restaurants.

name: ★City Center - Gran Via Apartment
description: This stylish and modern one bedroom apartment is part of a newly-constructed building that was completed at the end of 2008 and features all the conveniences of a new property whilst retaining the style and appearance of a more traditional block.
neighborhood_overview: The surrounding area is known for its liberal, diverse and bohemian atmosphere, with the nearby neighborhood of Malasaña boasting funky bars, artistic boutiques and trendy cafes on every corner. Due to its central location, this property has excellent transport connections, including the metro, several bus stops, and a taxi rank (stand) all nearby. Alternatively, many of Madrid's more famous attractions such as the Puerta del Sol or Templo de Debod are within walking distance, so you can explore this exciting and diverse city with ease.
host_about: Venezuelan architect, italian, spanish and Argentinian descent, loves to eat and share the city secrets with everybody who visit Madrid.  In 2008 starts a small holiday lettings company to complement the architecture and interior design job.  I have created Flat Sweet Home and today we manage several apartments in Madrid city center, I love to host people traveling, my main purpose is to give a beautiful experience to  my guests providing high quality apartments and service, a warm interior design and perfect cleaning.  In Flat Sweet Home we love our work, we think it’s important that we can fulfill the wishes of our guests.

description: Stay at a unique convenient apartment in a privileged magnificient location with Opera Square views within historical Austrias-Palacio area ..to enjoy The Madrid Experience!!You’ll walk to all boutiques, restaurants, bars, shops, museums, theatres, nightlife ..Our apartment is a spacious quiet one-bedroom apartment.Just 1 min Opera and 5 mins Sol subway/train stations. neighborhood_overview: PALACIO NEIGHBORHOODPalacio is a neighborhood full of Madrid's grand historic buildings. Busy tapas bars line the arcades of the 17th-century Plaza Mayor. Madrid's 18th-century Royal Palace is famous for its sumptuous furnishings and landscaped gardens. Opera and dance performances are staged at the 19th-century Teatro Real. Nearby, the steps of the baroque Almudena Cathedral are a popular gathering place to watch the sunset.MADRIDMadrid , Spain  capital   , is one of the cities that is becoming a very attractive tourist destination for both Spanish and international tourists in recent years.Beyond the monuments that can be visited in Madrid, the charm that is experienced in its main squares and streets, with landmarks such as the Plaza Mayor,  Puerta del Sol or the reborn Gran Via, is one of its main attractions. But above all those who visit Madrid appreciate the very welcoming spirit of the city, always with a great cultural, leisure and gastronomic atm
host_about: La gastronomia,  el cine,  el arte, las calles  de Madrid me apasionan!!

description: Wonderful bright apartment near El Matadero, a few steps from the center of Madrid. Thanks to its 4 rooms and 2 bathrooms it can accommodate up to 6 guests very comfortably.The apartment has air conditioning in the living room and in the main bedrooms.The apartment is located in a strategic area, very well connected by metro and bus with all the touristic points of the capital. The neighborhood is residential, very quiet and with an offer of restaurants and bars very interesting.
neighborhood_overview: Central neighborhood, 5 min walk from Madrid Río, El Matadero cultural center and Tierno Galván park.

name: 2 bedroom apartament in Chueca-Fuen
description: Comfy and cozzy Two bedrooms apartment in Downtown Madrid. First bedroom  with queen size bed. Queen sofa bed at the living room. And twin beds in little room. Two balconies. Full Kitchen.Best location
host_about:
Somos una familia a la que le gusta viajar con nuestros hijos. Nos gusta las ciudades, las compras, la musica, los teatros, los museos.

Si viajas con niños sobre todo pequeños podemos ayudarte con la infrestructura, cunas, medico, babysitter...

name: Calm, affordable room in Madrid.
description: The apartment is located in a safe, quiet and tree lined residential areas. City center within 15 min by Metro,bus stop in front of the apartment and big supermarket within walking distance as well.
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is quiet, beautiful, safe and full of trees and green areas.It is a quiet area and it is pleasant to walk around. You have many shops and within 7 minutes walking you have the Carrefour Shopping Center, with a gym, Post Office and more shops inside.In the neighborhood there are quite a few bars with outdoor terraces and good tapas.
host_about:
Hablo un poco de frances y un poco de ingles.
Soy respetuosa con lo que es diferente. 
Abro mi casa al viajero para que pueda estar más cómodo y más feliz .
 Establezco con el una relación humana,de familia, no es una relación comercial.
Creo firmemente que todos somos parte de la gran familia humana. 

Hello! I’m Cinthia and I speak some English and French.
 I respect people and their differences.  I open my home to travelers so they can be comfortable and happier. 
 I like to establish a human relationship with my guests, as if we are family, not a commercial transaction.
I firmly belive that we are all part of a great human family.

name: PRADO MUSEUM AIR & OnSiteParking (*)
description: (*) We offer a garage in the same building (ask host fee).It is a modern and bright apartment, located in the pedestrian center of MAdrid, close to all the museums of the city. Less than 100 meters away.
host_about:
Somos una familia hispano - cubana de universitarios. 
Nos gusta la vida en la ciudad, el cine, el teatro y el deporte. 
Tenemos dos hijos de 18 y 15 años de edad y vivimos en el mismo edificio de los apartamento que ofrecemos.  La zona de Madrid donde vivimos nos encanta.
Hablamos y escribimos frances e ingles. 
Tenemos familia viviendo en Canada, cerca de Toronto.

name: Self-catering Apartment in Madrid
description: Creative and cosy flat in Madrid in multicultural Lavapies neighborhood.
neighborhood_overview: FACILITIESTaxi and Bank at the cornerSupermarketFood shops opened until midnighta few Vegan shopsTake away foodies
host_about:
We are a Miguel & Iaia, a musician and a photographer truly and deeply in love with Madrid.

Miguel is born in the sunny Mallorca, but he lives in Madrid since twelve years, professionally working as music perfomer and composer. He plays chess, he collects old music instruments and  vintage jazz vinyls.
Iaia is based since eight years in Madrid where she works as art-director and freelance photographer. She's a foodie for passion, probably because of the italian blood, she collects herbs, spices and old recipes books.

name: ELOÍSA Fabuloso Loft en Lavapies.
description: Loft apartment in downtown Madrid.135cm bed It's a fourth floor with elevator on a very quiet street.We are pet friendly with breed surcharge.SECURITY LOCK. ANTI-COPIA KEY.INTEGRATED MEDICAL SERVICE WITH CHIRON HEALTH.It is the house where I live, but, as I travel a lot, the destination is also the destination to welcome guests1 pet is allowed with an additional fee of €40/stay LATE CHECK IN ( 21:00-00:00)--30€LATE CHECK IN ( 00:00-7:00)  50€
neighborhood_overview: Es un barrio de acceso restringido para la circulación, por lo que es necesario solicitar un permiso para entrar. Si vienes en coche, por favor, dímelo y dime tu número de matrícula para que pueda solicitar el permiso. No nos hacemos responsables de las multas.Es un barrio bohemio y lleno de gente con un potencial creativo maravilloso.Tiene  gran espíritu solidario y no faltan entretenimientos con mucha imaginación.Tiene un peso cultural muy importante en la vida madrileña tanto por todos los eventos de teatro clásico como de una enorme variedad de teatros alternativos.Catas de vino, paseos en bici, visitas guiadas…Es el madrileño barrio de Lavapies, muy famosos por su gran actividad cultural. Es un barrio con una población muy diversa lo que le hace muy interesante.La "calle del arte" de Europa se encuentra aquí, haty multitud de galerías y salas de exposiciones. Restaurantes con encanto y mercados genuinos.English:It is a bohemia
host_about:
Hola! 
Somos un equipo dedicado a alquilar nuestros apartamentos. Tanto Elisa como yo misma nos encargaremos de daros una cálida bienvenida
Estaremos en contacto cuando se vaya acercando la fecha de llegada y os facilitaremos los detalles del alojamiento para que todo vaya como rodado en vuestro Check-in y estancia. 
Para empezar, necesitaríamos una hora de llegada aproximada, un email y un telefono de contacto, ya que no contamos con una recepción física y por ello uno de nosotros os recibirá en el apartamento a la hora estipulada. 
Cualquier duda estaremos encantados de atenderos. 
Hasta pronto!

Hi! 
We are a team who enjoys hosting people in our lovely apartments.
We will be in contact closer to your arrival day with all of the details you'll need for a smooth check in and a wonderful stay. 
In the meantime please let us know your estimated arrival time, your email and a phone number we can reach you on during your stay just in case, as we don't have any reception, one of us will meet you at the apartment at the agreed time. 
If there is anything else on your mind, please let us know and we’d love to assist! 
Kind Regards,

name: Lovely apartment CENTRAL MADRID !
description: Ideal place to visiting and enjoying Madrid walking from his historic center ! Located in a quiet street in the center of Madrid, a place with cultural and touristic interest, in the area there are museums, theatres, shops and bars with terraces.
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in  San Cosme y San Damián, a street surrounded by historic buildings such as the Palace of Fernán Núñez, the church of San Lorenzo from the 17th century, the Monastery of Santa Isabel, the Royal Superior Conservatory of Music and the museum Reina Sofía,  giving the street a great historical attraction.A few meters away, in Santa Isabel street, is the Dore cinema, headquarters of the National Film Library and the old Antón Martín food market which today has become the new Mecca of the gastronomic world.San Cosme y San Damián street is in the historical center of Madrid and in the Lavapies neighborhood, cataloged as the coolest neighborhood by the leisure magazine “Time Out” at the end of 2018. Famous for its sloping streets, its street culture, its lifelong shops, its traditional air, its traditional festivals, its “neighborhood” air and its gastronomic diversity thanks to the confluence of neighbors with very diverse origins in its streets. It is a
host_about:
I love travelling, meeting people from all over the world, the movies, animals ( specially dogs) enjoying nice people and being happy!

As a host, what I hope the most is that my  guests leave the place having had a  happy stay and of course, that they'll come back!!

My favorite quote "LIVE AND LET LIVE" :)


--------------------------------------------------------

Me encanta viajar, conocer gente de todo el mundo, ir al cine, los animales, especialmente los perros; disfrutar de la buena gente y ser feliz !!

Como anfitriona, lo que más deseo es que los huespedes de mi apartamento se vayan contentos  y por supuesto, que vuelvan !!!

Mi frase favorita   " VIVE Y DEJA VIVIR "

name: private house B & B. Arturo Soria (Metro)
description: Residential area, very quite house, no more guestsOther guests has been living for long periods.Very quiet no noise.No smokingThere is a cat
host_about: Hola soy una señora universitaria, no soy fumadora, y siempre estare disponible para ayudar. Un saludo!
amenities: Clothing storage: closet, wardrobe, and dresser

name: Paseo Castellana Deluxe Santiago Bernabeu
description: Rental by Season. Exclusive Apartment of 150 m2 for 6 people, 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, 1 toilet. With a pool table in the living room.  Suitable for families, groups of friends or business trips. Very close to Real Madrid stadium. Wi-Fi.
neighborhood_overview: SALIRSi usted quiere disfrutar de una estancia con lujo y glamour, en una buena zona de Madrid, perfectamente comunicada, este es su apartamento.Además, se encuentra en uno de los múltiples centros de la ciudad de Madrid. A escasos minutos en metro del centro histórico, el apartamento corona la Castellana, una de las vías más populares y con más solera de la ciudad. El apartamento está justo donde se encuentra la ciudad imperial con el nuevo eje de negocios que ahora conforman Plaza Castilla y las torres comerciales. Andando por la Castellana , que se divide en Paseo de la Castellana, Paseo de Recoletos y el Paseo del Prado, vamos viendo cómo convive la tradición con la modernidad. Desde el imponente edificio de la Biblioteca Nacional, hasta la histórica Cibeles, pasamos, a solo diez minutos andando desde el apartamento, por el Santiago Bernabeu, el glorioso estadio del Real Madrid.  Galerías de moda, restaurantes para todos los paladares, terrazas al aire libre
host_about:
We are a spanish family of architects and interior designers. We own several apartments in Madrid and Barcelona,  all of them are located in premium areas and are specially adapted for short term rentals for days, weeks or months. 

Our apartments are really special and are full of soul. Suitable for all those who want to enjoy their holidays, feel at home on a business trip, or take advantage of everything the city has to offer due to their exceptional location (something that students thank us a lot for). These are apartments with all the amenities, isolated from noise while being in the very center of the city. Equipped with all the necessities: from WIFI connection, essential for taking advantage of the city and planning the day before leaving home, to a wine-opener to uncork Spanish wine and savor it slowly after a long day. . .

Our way of being brings us closer to the people. We accompany them throughout the whole process, from the moment of booking until the check out. We give them advice according to their preferences and enrich their stay so they can make the most out of the city and, of course, the apartment. We keep them updated  from our weblogs on all the news, events, and dates not to be missed. We have open channels in social networks for consultation and suggestions, and they can benefit from the experience of others who have already enjoyed our services before.

Our apartments are a more human and personal alternative to hotels. The direct and constant attention, as well as a new home in the city makes us your best option.
  
Have a good trip and we hope to see you soon!!!
amenities: Shared backyard u2013 Not fully fenced

name: Estudio en Malasaña - Fuencarral
description: This cozy flat studio is interior-facing, meaning it has no interesting views but is exceptionally quiet with no traffic or street noise, a luxury that can be difficult to find in a busy capital city.
neighborhood_overview: Malasaña is to the west of Chueca and to the east of Argüelles. It is surrounded by several metro stations and is a central neighbourhood of Madrid. Residents include Esperanza Aguirre, the former Governor of the Province of Madrid, amongst other politicians and several artists.  It was the center of the movida movement in late 1970s and 1980s Madrid.Malasaña is a vibrant neighborhood full of lively bars and clubs overflowing with young people. Its streets are currently being renovated, making it a much more attractive quarter. It's one of the classic areas for partying the night away. The area's center is the Plaza del Dos de Mayo (in commemoration of a popular uprising on May 2, 1808, brutally repressed by the French troops and which started the Spanish Independence War). The night life is diverse in Malasaña, though the most common themes are non-pretentious style places (alternative, funk, mainstream), mixed places (including many conspicuous LGBT, which hav
host_about: Venezuelan architect, italian, spanish and Argentinian descent, loves to eat and share the city secrets with everybody who visit Madrid.  In 2008 starts a small holiday lettings company to complement the architecture and interior design job.  I have created Flat Sweet Home and today we manage several apartments in Madrid city center, I love to host people traveling, my main purpose is to give a beautiful experience to  my guests providing high quality apartments and service, a warm interior design and perfect cleaning.  In Flat Sweet Home we love our work, we think it’s important that we can fulfill the wishes of our guests.
amenities: Paid high chair - available upon request

name: Classy Central Family Alcalá Deluxe
description: Apartment of 160 m2 for up to 6 people, with 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a large terrace overlooking the street Alcalá. Suitable for families, groups of friends or business trips. In a lively area of Madrid. Free Wifi
neighborhood_overview: GOING OUTThe apartment is in one of several areas that make up the cosmopolitan Madrid. More specifically in the Salamanca district, an elegant and luxurious neighborhood with nineteenth century architecture, which coexists with the more typical Madrid, the Madrid of the “tapas” and the life on the streets, its friendly people, the joy and the sunshine . A neighborhood that borders the bullring of Las Ventas, located a few meters away. At the same door of the building is one of the most charismatic restaurants of Madrid, El Rincon de Jaen, where bullfighters and celebrities come together. Also, 30 meters away there are two Metro stops that connect directly with the rest of the city: Ventas, lines 2 and 5, and Manuel Becerra, lines 2 and 6. And 10 meters from the apartment you have a bus stop that also connects well with other areas of the city.The Barrio de Salamanca is also known to be the most exclusive shopping area. Here there are the streets Goya, Serrano a

We are a spanish family of architects and interior designers. We own several apartments in Madrid and Barcelona,  all of them are located in premium areas and are specially adapted for short term rentals for days, weeks or months. 

Our apartments are really special and are full of soul. Suitable for all those who want to enjoy their holidays, feel at home on a business trip, or take advantage of everything the city has to offer due to their exceptional location (something that students thank us a lot for). name: THIS GREAT VIEW IN BRIGHT LATINA
description: Announcing the best views of ancient Madrid! The two balconies of Bright Latina offer stunning views of the of San Andres Baroque dome, in the middle of the La Latina historic district. Light has a truly Mediterranean feel here
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is in the La Latina district, a beloved area by locals. Walk along cobblestone streets to lively, open squares featuring charming cafes and delicious restaurants. Browse the street markets and explore the city's iconic landmarks.
host_about:
This is Mey and I love Madrid, this lively city with so much to offer.
Comunication is key for us. Please let us know anything you think we are able to improve. 

...............
Soy Mey, me encanta Madrid y hemos creado espacios inspiradores, lugares donde querrás quedarte para siempre.

Insistimos en la comunicación y la confianza con los huespedes.

name: Very quiet central top floor with 2 terraces
description: Beautiful central top floor apartment situated on the trendy and "hip" quarter of Malasaña, one of Madrid’s liveliest neighborhood, an unbeatable location, right in the heart of Madrid. It is surrounded by a broad selection of trendy restaurants.
neighborhood_overview: Malasaña un barrio castizo del centro de Madrid en continua evolución, donde conviven en perfecta armonía los vecinos y establecimientos de toda la vida con los jóvenes recien llegados al barrio, los negocios más chics y los visitantes, que se enamoran a primera vista, porque es el barrio más divertido y más interesante de Madrid.. y parte del universo!
host_about:
Organizo conciertos y festivales de música. Tengo dos hijos. Me gusta cocinar y cuidar mis plantas, viajar, callejear y conocer otras culturas. 

Por mi profesión suelo estar informado de las actividades culturales y de ocio de Madrid. No dejes de preguntarme cualquiera que sea la que más te interese . Estare encantado de poder recomendarte las más interesantes

name: Cozy, luminous  excellenty placed
description: Nice apartment, very bright and in a very central and quiet.
host_about:
Soy una persona abierta y que le gusta conocer gente nueva de sitios diferentes, creo que es muy enriquecedor  como  persona. Conozco muy bien mi ciudad y soy una enamorada de ella, osea que como anfitrión se indicar a mis  huespedes los lugares de interes para que  disfruten plenamente de su  estancia en Madrid.
Creo que es una gran oportunidad conocer una  ciudad como Madrid,  ayudado pon una persona que vive aquí.

name: Habitación en ático muy centrico con dos terrazas
description: A beautiful 4th floor attic flat situated right on the trendy and "hip" quarter of Malasaña, one of Madrid’s liveliest neighbourhoods, an unbeatable location, right in the heart of Madrid. It is surrounded by a broad selection of trendy restaurants.
neighborhood_overview: Malasaña es un barrio castizo del centro de Madrid en continua evolución, donde conviven en armonía los negocios más antiguos con los más chics, los vecinos de toda la vida con los jóvenes recien llegados al barrio y con los turistas, que se enamoran en cuanto lo conocen porque es el barrio más divertido e interesante de Madrid.
host_about:
Organizo conciertos y festivales de música. Tengo dos hijos. Me gusta cocinar y cuidar mis plantas, viajar, callejear y conocer otras culturas. 

Por mi profesión suelo estar informado de las actividades culturales y de ocio de Madrid. No dejes de preguntarme cualquiera que sea la que más te interese . Estare encantado de poder recomendarte las más interesantes

name: PUERTA DEL SOL-QUIET DOWNTOWN
description: Our house is a charming attic with a lot of charm, in a building from 1890, with original beams, perfect for stays in Madrid right in the center of the city, next to Puerta del Sol, which offers you day and night life. at night. Access to your room is through the stairs that you can see in the photos. The maximum height of your room is 1.71 cm, with the ceiling falling. Very romantic, with great views of the rooftops of Madrid.
host_about: Somos una pareja que vivimos con nuestra hija pequeña, nos encanta conocer gente de otras culturas. Hablamos español, ingles e italiano. Nos encanta nuestra ciudad e informar sobre ella a los visitantes.

name: Converted theatre, historic centre
description: Set of rooms with own bathroom (not ensuite, but near your bedroom) and sitting room in large family flat  in 19th century "palacete"; delicious breakfast served; everything in walking distance, but quiet street. No extra costs (apart from airbnb's!) No kitchen or cooking facilities available.
neighborhood_overview: This is the heart of old Madrid. We have Plaza Mayor, Sol, La Latina, the 3 great art galleries all right on hand, as well as about 500 restaurants within walking distance!
host_about: Although I'm English, I've been living in Spain (Barcelona and Madrid) for half my life, so that must make me "bicultural"! I hosted for a few years, enjoyed it, and am returning to it after  a work-related break. I love the opportunity it gives, as a host, to meet the widest range of people, with all sorts of interests and profiles. Madrid is a great place for a holiday - it can be as relaxed (all-day tapas, siestas) or as lively (bars & clubs everywhere, except for my street fortunately) and as cultural (I'm really close to the 4 major galleries) as you like. And for football aficionados,  well, it's obvious! I would be delighted to give as much or as little guidance as you want to have. Come & stay!

name: Fantastic Location. Great apartment, Opera
description: Sunny, cozy, one bedroom apartment in the heart of Madrid (603 square feet). Walking distance to all amenities, public transportation, museums, shops, restaurants, cafes, and bars. It is located in Opera square, right on the corner of the Opera house and the fabulous Plaza de Oriente (Royal Palace Square), the most beautiful spot in the city.
host_about: This apartment is the house of a university professor working and living in the US at the moment, so the entire unit is available all year long from the end of August to mid December, and from first week of January to mid May, when the owner is not there for its use.
amenities: TV with standard cable, DVD player

name: Swimming Pool & Chill Out Terrace - trendy Chueca
description: Cozy Studio, ideal for two guests with a capacity of up to 4 people (ideally up to 2 adults and 2 children), in one of the most demanded neighbourhoods of Madrid. Located in trendy Chueca, a centric neighbourhood that concentrates on the largest leisure and restaurant offer in the city.
neighborhood_overview: Trendy and full of life, Chueca is at the heart for MADrid lifestyle.Within walking distance, you can enjoy layback sunset rooftop bars, popular restaurant, bars with cool atmosphere and a sophisticated hipster vibe. Located in the heart of the city, next to Gran Vía, Chueca is one of the neighbourhood's of Madrid best known internationally for its atmosphere and nightlife. However, the appeal comes on several fronts, and art and history is also one of them.Chueca hosts the Fernando de Castro Foundation and the Museum of Romanticism, former palace of the Marquis de Matallana built in 1776, which houses an interesting collection of paintings, furniture and decorative arts of the nineteenth century, representative of the cultural, political and daily life of Madrid Romantic (works by Goya, Esquivel, Madrazo, Alenza and the Becquer brothers, among others). A few meters away, there is the Palace of Longoria, one of the few completely modernis
host_about:
Bien Venido to Madrid or to Lisboa

Attention to detail was given to provide you a truly unique experience. 
Wish you a safe travel. Fun Ahead.

Gracias / Obrigado
amenities: Private outdoor pool - available all year, open 24 hours
Paid parking garage on premises u2013 20 spaces
Paid crib - always at the listing
Clothing storage: closet, wardrobe, and dresser

name: habitacion luminosa madrid-centro
description: quiet and family house, I always have two rooms available alive in a central area,Plaza Castilla - four roads 15 min from downtown Madrid by metro , 10 min to the chamartin station, 20 minutes from Atocha Renfe , 15 minutes from Santiago Bernaveu Stadium, near the bus,  metro,, shops, etc., send a message to request a reservation , sometimes guests extend their stay , please do not smoke, check I have more rooms!!
neighborhood_overview: que se encuentra en un zona centrica a10 min del casco antiguo , de la zona centro de madrdi
host_about: soy una persona de trato agradable , me encanta recibir huespedes de todas las nacionalidades y de ESPAÑA , para compartir sus experiencias y hacer de su estancia lo más agradable

name: Estupenda habitación en el centro
description: A double room with natural light
host_about:
Hablo frances  y Español Soy una mujer activa, me gusta cocinar, pasear, escuchar música y ver la TV.  . En la casa vivo con mi hija María, que estudia en la universidad.
Disfruto hablando con la gente y conociendo diferentes culturas.

name: Great Studio for Rent in Madrid
description: New studio rental in Madrid, ideal for foreign students who want to live long stays in Madrid. THE APARTMENT IS ALL EQUIPPED, in long stays the only thing that is paid extra is the electricity consumption. The price includes wifi, water and taxes
host_about:
Hola , mi nombre es Laura, soy Argentina y vivo en Madrid hace 14 años. Me gusta recibir estudiantes extranjeros por largo tiempo.
Hi Im Laura , i'm from argentina , i live and work in Madrid since 2007.
I ussually receive long term guest (foreing students).

name: Central and quiet.
description: It is a fantastically situated apartment right in the historic centre of Madrid. It is quiet and peaceful, making it a perfect place to rest after a busy day. Maximum capacity two adults. Children are considered guests. The Puerta del Sol, The Royal Palace and the famous Plaza Mayor are all just around the corner. Besides, you will be able to enjoy the quietness of this peaceful street.
neighborhood_overview: The area immediately surrounding the apartment is full of traditional and modern cafes, restaurants and typical Spanish “tabernas”.  Both Calle Arenal and Calle Mayor offer great shopping and entertainment.With such charm and lovely atmosphere it can be difficult to leave this neighbourhood, but should you want to explore further, the area is extremely well comunicated and offers a number of different transport options including bus, metro and train, thus allowing guests to explore the surrounding area with ease.
host_about:
El apartamento es muy acogedor, tranquilo, esta en un lugar muy centrico, te sentirás como en tu casa.
Contacta conmigo para cualquier cuestión.

name: Quiet downtown Madrid, nearby all
description: Exterior single room, with all you need to study/work/rest in short/long periods (table, WiFi, TV, wardrobe, linen/towels, ...) with the right to use common services of the house. Lifelong neighbors and discreet. Numerous media transport close
neighborhood_overview: The property has lifelong neighbors and discreet. The neighborhood is quiet and central, sure, with much life, home and small specialist shops and large area (Carrefour, Corte Ingles of Goya street, DIA, Eroski, Supersol ...). Very pleasant evening stroll with crowded streets and terraces next boulevards
host_about: Mi vivienda habitual era aquí en mi casa de Madrid donde trabaje de lunes a viernes pues mi vida transcurre mucha parte del tiempo en Bilbao. Lo hago ahora con horarios flexible, tambien en modo teletrabajo pero participando en acciones de voluntariado vía la Fundación social de la empresa de Comunicaciones en la que he trabajado durante muchos años como Ingeniero. En las jornadas normales, empleo parte de mi tiempo en practicar algún deporte e ir al gimnasio, asistir a cursos, hacer compras o ir al cine. Suelo ausentarme de Madrid con bastante frecuencia, aunque ocasionalmente viene a visitarme mi pareja. Me gusta leer, viajar, la comunicación 2.0, practicar la natación y correr -no más de 10 Km-. visitar museos, asistir a algún concierto o teatro, ir a la Filmoteca, o pasear con parada en un par de bares ;), lo que es fácil en Madrid para mí ya que vivo en el centro y se puede ir caminando a todas partes sin necesidad de coche. Además tengo cuatro estaciones de metro al lado de casa y otras cuatro líneas de autobús  que me dejan en un cuarto de hora en pleno casco antiguo de la ciudad, a lo que añadir biciMAD, sistema público de transporte en bicicleta electrica con tres aparcamientos cerca.

name: Puerta del Sol - Palacio Real.
description: It is a fantastically situated apartment right in the historic centre of Madrid. It is quiet and peaceful, making it a perfect place to rest after a busy day.It's  first floor open-plan studio with high ceilings and an independent bathroom. Two balconies to the street.  Kitchen equipment for six.  Four seats dining-table.  One double bed (2,00 x 1,35) and a double sofa-bed (2,00 x1,40).

Both Calle Arenal and Calle Mayor offer great shopping and entertainment.With such charm and lovely atmosphere it can be difficult to leave this neighbourhood, but should you want to explore further, the area is extremely well comunicated and offers a number of different transport options including bus, metro and train, thus allowing guests to explore the surrounding area with ease.

name: Piso de 3 habitaciones junto al metro
description: Ground floor with 3 bedrooms, bright, located in a safe and quiet area and well connected, next to the "La Almudena" metro line 2, surrounded by green areas and all kinds of shops around

Happy to help you to plan your trip!

name: study sol-atocha I
description: The Madrid Sol I studio has a double sofa bed and two single beds. It is very bright, with garden areas and has Internet. The fully equipped kitchen with all appliances. This house is adjacent to the Madrid Sol II Studio in order to accommodate a larger group. The building has an elevator and a concierge. The study opens onto an interior patio with lots of light.
host_about: Hola mi nombre es Reyes y espero hacer mas agradable vuestra estancia en Madrid, disponemos de dos viviendas muy centricas y siempre podeis contar con nuestro ayuda para informaros de esos sitios menos turisticos pero si lugares muy atractivos que solo los residentes de Madrid conocemos. Vienvenidos a nuestra ciudad.

name: Feel at home (ATTIC)
description: Make yourself at home.  This is my home and I want it to be yours, so that you feel Madrid as your city.  SUITABLE only for SMOKERS or without problems with the smell of tobacco.  It's not business;  It is survival.  Cheerful, artistic (almost all the decoration is for sale ;-) bright, quiet and cozy flat in the heart of the city, within walking distance of the main tourist places, from the Plaza Mayor to Puerta del Sol, the Royal Palace and Lavapies.
neighborhood_overview: The most ancient, cosmopolitan, full of live neighborhood in Madrid. Really close to everywhere. This is the T R U L Y city center.
host_about:
Soy periodista y un poquito artista, además de otro poquito profesora de español. 
He vivido en Australia, Estados Unidos y Suecia, en unos sitios más tiempo que en otros.
Como invitada soy muy discreta: no me verás el pelo si no quieres; como anfitriona... lo mismo ;-)

Check the reviews I have collected from several marketplaces on my Fidbacks trust profile: my Fidbacks pseudo is martinez
amenities: Paid parking garage on premises u2013 90 spaces
Denon sound system with Bluetooth and aux

name: Vintage and Scandi Chic at an Historic Central Madrid Home
description: This stylish two-bedroom apartment is part of a building from 19th Century, and features all the conveniences of a new property whilst retaining the style and appearance of a more traditional apartment block. Modern and vintage elements mingle easily, from a retro stage light to transparent dining chairs. VT-2555The surrounding area is known for its liberal, diverse and bohemian atmosphere, with the nearby neighborhood of Malasaña boasting funky bars, artistic boutiques and quirky cafes on every corner. Gran Via's wide avenues and beautiful deco architecture are steps away.Due to its central location, this property has excellent transport links. Alternatively, many of Madrid's more famous places are within walking distance.This is an excellent choice for those looking for a true inner-city experience.•San Bernardo, Noviciado, Plaza de España, Bilbao (lines 1, 2, 3, 4, 10) are some Metro stations near to the apartment•Bus Lines 3, 21, 147•
neighborhood_overview: The surrounding area is known for its liberal, diverse and bohemian atmosphere, with the nearby neighborhood of Malasaña boasting funky bars, artistic boutiques and quirky cafes on every corner. Gran Via's wide avenues and beautiful deco architecture are steps away.Due to its central location, this property has excellent transport links. Alternatively, many of Madrid's more famous places are within walking distance.This is an excellent choice for those looking for a true inner-city experience.

name: sol-atocha II study
description: This studio has a single sofa bed and two single beds. It is very bright, with garden areas and has Internet. The fully equipped kitchen with all appliances. This house is adjacent to the Sol-Atocha I Studio in order to accommodate a larger group. The bathroom has a half bathtub. The building has an elevator and a concierge.
host_about: Hola mi nombre es Reyes y espero hacer mas agradable vuestra estancia en Madrid, disponemos de dos viviendas muy centricas y siempre podeis contar con nuestro ayuda para informaros de esos sitios menos turisticos pero si lugares muy atractivos que solo los residentes de Madrid conocemos. Vienvenidos a nuestra ciudad.

name: Central, fully equipped, best price
description: Located in one of the most important and elegant streets in the centre of Madrid, a very few metres away from Bilbao underground station, this interior one-roomed 25m2 apartment is suitable for two people. Very bright, with two interior balconies, in a 4th floor. A lift in the building to facilitate access to the floors.Wifi.Hair-dryer, fridge, vitroceramic cooker, oven, washing machine, dishwasher, micro-wave oven, coffee-maker, kettle, toaster and a juicer. Bedlinen is provided.
neighborhood_overview: The area is completely safe and there are plenty of restaurants, cafes, markets, supermarkets, cinemas and all different kind of shops around, so by choosing to stay in such a suitable area, you will certainly assure yourself a convenient and very nice stay in Madrid.
host_about: Hola! Soy Marina. Nací en Madrid y soy hija y nieta de madrileños. Adoro mi ciudad y me encantará enseñarte los lugares más emblemáticos que no se deben dejar de visitar en esta ciudad, así como aquellos otros más desconocidos y especiales, que no aparecen en las guías turísticas. Os espero!

name: Large single room in Madrid's trending Almagro.
description: Very comfortable room in Madrid's central Almagro district, well connected by metro (on the doorstep) and bus and two steps away from the Ponzano Street food scene, la Plaza de Olavide with its lively terraces and the centre of Madrid, wiht la Puerta del Sol only a 15 minute metro ride away on line 1.
neighborhood_overview: Chamberí is one of those neighbourhoods that has everything and also retains its traditional flavour. The Iglesia metro station is on our doorstep, just 3 stops from Gran Via and also, bus stops number, 61, 16, 3, 147, to move around on the surface if you prefer. From here you can reach the gastronomic area of Ponzano and the always lively Plaza de Olavide with its terraces.A little further on is Calle Fuencarral, full of shops and cinemas. If you like culture, the Pintor Sorolla Museum is just around the corner and the Archaeological Museum and the National Library are only a 15 minute walk away. If you are passing through and are going to continue your travels in Spain, don't hesitate to let me know, as I know it very well and I can recommend amazing places in almost every major city in Spain. I will be happy to make recommendations to make your stay in Madrid and in Spain, unforgettable.
host_about: Acostumbrado a viajar y habiendo vivido en países tan distantes como Australia, me considero un tipo abierto con buen sentido del humor y gran amigo de compartir mi espacio con gente interesante que ha visto en Airbnb una manera más autentica de viajar.

name: ROYAL PALACE, OPERA, PLAZA MAYOR, LATINA, SOL
description: This is a beautiful apartment with high ceilings on first floor. Great for couples looking to escape for a long weekend in one of the most romantic barrio of Madrid. Fully furnished with all modern appliances: AC, hairdryer, Nescafe espresso machine, Apple TV, Blu Ray Disc Player, Sennheiser HD headset, etc. Full bed / Tempur mattress!
neighborhood_overview: Walking distance to the Prado, Thyssen and Reina Sofia Museums. 2 minute walk to the major Tourist Information office in the city, with lots of information and ideas for you to do. You will have a great time in Madrid at my apartment.
host_about:
Hola, I'm Leo Lema a passionate tennis, swimming and plant lover.  
I own and operate a plant decoration shop in Madrid, that you can visit anytime, it is called Greenworks Madrid.
If you love plants, vertical gardens or mini Eco Systems let's talk.
In fact I host the "create your own terrarium" experience in there:
https://www.airbnb.co.uk/experiences/165860

Come and visit us!
amenities: 32" HDTV with Disney+, HBO Max, Amazon Prime Video, Apple TV, standard cable, Netflix

name: Spectacular Penthouse 95 m² Latina
description: Spectacular penthouse with two bedrooms and one bathroom, exterior, bright, large terrace, in the heart of the city, extraordinary views of Old Madrid, the Rastro and La Latina area, newly renovated and furnished, brand new bathroom, internet, excellent location.
neighborhood_overview: Around the house there are a lot of shops, pubs, supermarkets, parkings (just below), medical centers, and of course, public transport: 5 line buses, underground, trains, and the highspeed train station is only 15 minutes away from the attic.
host_about:
BATUECAS TRAVEL es una empresa conformada por un equipo de profesionales dedicados al sector de la Atención al Turista. 

En los 10 años de trayectoria en Madrid, nos hemos consolidado y nos fortalecemos día a día para ofrecer alojamiento a quienes desean abrir las puertas a un sin fin de experiencias en cultura y gastronomía española. 

Para ver todas nuestras propiedades, te invito a acceder a nuestro perfil:
 
www.airbnb.es/p/batuecastravel
amenities: Envase de Champu00fa rellenable por razones mediambientales shampoo
Paid clamp on table seat high chair - always at the listing
Envase de Gel de ducha rellenable por razones medioambientales body soap

name: BEST STUDIO IN VERY CENTER MADRID FIBRE OPTIC WIFI
description: Beautiful studio apartment built in a lovely building right in the centre of Madrid, near Gran Via. 2nd floor with lift. Totally refurbished in 2018. Interior apartment so it is very quiet and peaceful with zero street noise. Super-comfortable new bed, extra wide (160cm) and a sofa bed for one person too. Fibre-optic WIFI, very fast. Bathroom with shower. Kitchenette. The apartment is without a doubt in the best area for restaurants and bars.
neighborhood_overview: Undoubtably the best area of the centre of Madrid, in Chueca/Justicia and very close to the fantastic San Antón Market for tapas on the First Floor. This is the best area of Madrid for restaurants and bars. Right next to the wonderful shopping street of Fuencaral. Everything is near; the theatres of Gran Via, Puerta del Sol,  and near the metros of Tribunal, Gran Via and Chueca.
host_about: Preparamos nuestros hogares para que te sientas como en casa, o mejor.

name: PLAZA MAYOR - FELIPE III PENTH. ROOFTOP BALCONY
description: Please before make the reservation, ENTER correctly the total NUMBER of GUEST, including you, that will be staying at the apartment and READ the HOUSE RULES.
neighborhood_overview: NEIGHBOURHOOD & LOCATION:Here in the heart of Madrid’s city centre you are surrounded by a taste of grocery stores, tapas bars, like the famous Mercado de San Miguel and lots of conveniences.This is the "Los Austrias Neighbourhood" Sol district, bordering with Las Letras Neighbourhood in Huertas neighbourhood or La Latina Neighbourhood.You are under 5 minutes walk you arrive at Palacio Real, Opera or to the Km 0 at Puerta del Sol; the centre of Madrid and, in fact, the centre of Spain.Nearby Metro station: Sol (L1, L2, L3)Parking under the square Plaza Mayor._________________________
host_about:
I live in Madrid but I'm from the Basque Country in the north of Spain. The city where I come from is Vitoria-Gasteiz and has been recognized as the European Green Capital. 
I lived in Los Angeles In 1997, then I moved to New York, Barcelona, and finally I ended up in Madrid, a beautifull city shinned almost everyday under a great blue sky!
I'm an actress and I also manage these very nice apartments from my friends actors and artists too.
I also love traveling around the world and meeting new people!!

name: ❤Quiet & Comfortable apartment downtown
description: This modernly colourful apartment is an architects jewel. You will have privacy, silence and comfort right in the middle of Madrid. It is close to museums, restaurants and subway, access it through a wine tree covered patio: Open kitchen, living room, bedroom with one double or two twin beds, bathroom. WiFi. Cable TV. Landline phone.NOT apt for INFANTS or PETS.NOT ACCESSIBLE: There is NO LIFT, but 30 sturdy concrete steps.
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located at calle Olivar, one of the most quiet streets in Lavapies, which is a multi-cultural neighbourhood, full of exotic flavours, lively, safe, friendly, with all kinds of shops and supermarkets. Rent this self catering apartment in this exciting city and explore its artistic, architectural and gastronomic delights in style.Alternative museums like Tabacalera, Casa Encendida, CaixaForum and Matadero are strung in a 15 minutes walk radius.Brand new and highly recommendable is Madrid Rio: the 650 ha. large and 10 km long park alongside the Manzanares river, where cyclists and lovebirds meet skateboarders and dog-walkers.
host_about:
I love traveling, the nature, the wild, the animals, science fiction, a nice view, the quiet places, breath fresh air. My passion helping the people realize that we shouldn't use the planet's resources as our property.

Me gusta viajar, la naturaleza salvaje, los animales, el aire libre, los deportes. Me encanta hacer saber a las personas que los recursos naturales de este planeta no son nuestra propiedad.
amenities: 40" HDTV with Fire TV, standard cable, Netflix
